## Discussion

Use one of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounterSet] type’s static properties, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounterSet/timestamp], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounterSet/stageUtilization], and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounterSet/statistic] instead of creating a common counter set instance yourself with this initializer.

# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a common counter set name from a raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The name of a counter set as a string.

## Discussion

Use one of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounterSet] type’s static properties, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounterSet/timestamp], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounterSet/stageUtilization], and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounterSet/statistic] instead of creating a common counter set instance yourself with this initializer.
title: init(rawValue:)
